author: cms-trackeralign
body:
###### PR description:

The goal of this PR is to integrate a new High Granularity Tracker Alignment Prompt Calibration Loop using both MinumumBias and Z   data ("HG Combined alignment), aiming to provide alignment conditions for the High Level Triggers (HLT).
This would help keeping the alignment conditions for the HLT up to date to help combat effects of radiations damage, which accumulate over the year (see e.g. [here](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1478755/contributions/6228895/attachments/2972885/5232524/STEAM%20tracking%2022.Nov.24.pdf)).
This development is co-authored by @mmusich


###### PR validation:

This PR has been validated using the recipe [*]. Results of this validation can be inspected on [this](https://phnattla.web.cern.ch/Alignment/PCL_Validations/HLTHGComb_validations/Validation_PCL_386801_HLTHGComb_hltVerticesPFFilter/PV/) website.

[*]
```bash
cmsrel CMSSW_14_2_0_pre3
cd CMSSW_14_2_0_pre3/src/
cmsenv
git cms-init
git cms-merge-topic cms-trackeralign:HLT_TkAl_HGComb
scramv1 b -j 20
cmsenv
voms-proxy-init --voms cms --valid 192:00
cd Alignment/CommonAlignmentProducer/test
source test-PromptCalibProdSiPixelAliHLTHGC.sh 
```

CC: @henriettepetersen @TomasKello
title: Introduce High Granularity Tracker Alignment Prompt Calibration Loop for HLT alignment conditions
